IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: A PRIVATE CATHOLIC CO-ED (GRADES K-8) SCHOOL WHOSE MISSION IS TO SERVE CHILDREN OF VARIED ABILITY LEVELS AND CHILDREN OF VARIOUS SOCIO-ECONOMIC, RACIAL, ETHNIC AND RELIGIOUS BACKGROUNDS. THE SCHOOL SESRVES APPROXIMATELY 388 STUDENTS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: A PRIVATE CATHOLIC CO-ED (GRADES K-8) SCHOOL WHOSE MISSION IS TO SERVE CHILDREN OF VARIED ABILITY LEVELS AND CHILDREN OF VARIOUS SOCIO-ECONOMIC, RACIAL, ETHNIC AND RELIGIOUS BACKGROUNDS. THE SCHOOL SERVES APPROXIMATELY 388 STUDENTS.
IRS990.Desc: TUITION AND FEES FOR PROVIDING EDUCATIONAL SERVICES FOR GRADES K THROUGH 8TH

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL RECOGNIZES THE TAX BENEFITS OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS ONLY WHERE THE POSITION IS "MORE LIKELY THAN NOT" TO BE SUSTAINED ASSUMING EXAMINATION BY TAX AUTHORITIES. MANAGEMENT HAS ANALYZED THE SCHOOL'S TAX POSITIONS AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT NO LIABILITY FOR UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS SHOULD BE RECORDED RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS TAKEN ON RETURNS FILED FOR THE OPEN TAX YEARS (2020 THROUGH 2022), OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN THE SCHOOL'S TAX RETURN FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2023. THE SCHOOL IDENTIFIES ITS MAJOR TAX JURISDICTIONS AS THE U.S. FEDERAL AND THE STATE OF TENNESSEE. HOWEVER, THE SCHOOL IS NOT CURRENTLY UNDER AUDIT NOR HAS THE SCHOOL BEEN CONTACTED BY ANY OF THESE JURISDICTIONS. THE SCHOOL IS NOT AWARE OF ANY TAX POSITIONS FOR WHICH IT IS REASONABLY POSSIBLE THAT THE TOTAL AMOUNTS OF UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS WILL CHANGE IN THE NEXT TWELVE MONTHS.
TUITION ASSISTANCE NETTED WITH REVENUE RECLASSED TO EXPENSE 257,168.
TUITION ASSISTANCE NETTED WITH REVENUE RECLASSED TO EXPENSE 257,168.
THE POLICY IS INCLUDED ON THE WEBSITE AND IN MATERIALS DISTRIBUTED TO PROSPECTIVE STUDENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: PART I, LINE 2 - PROCEDURES FOR MONITORING THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL MAINTAINS ALL GRANT REQUEST APPLICATIONS ALONG WITH COPIES OF CHECKS RECEIVED. ALL GRANTS AND OTHER ASSISTANCE ARE USED FOR SCHOOL TUITION AND FEES.
HEALTH AND EDUCATIONAL FACILITIES BOND $4,615,915 OF THE BOND PROCEEDS WERE USED TO REFUND A PRIOR ISSUE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NOMINATING COMMITTEE BRINGS PROSPECTIVE MEMBERS BEFORE THE ENTIRE BOARD FOR REVIEW. A RECOMMENDATION IS MADE TO THE BOARD TO ACCEPT NOMINEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DECISIONS ARE BASED ON THE GOVERNING BY-LAWS. ALL ACTIONS REQUIRE MOTIONS AND APPROVAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE HEAD OF THE SCHOOL REVIEWS THE FORM 990 PRIOR TO HIS SIGNATURE AND FILING. THE FORM 990 IS MADE AVAILABLE TO THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING BODY UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS OUTLINED IN THE BY-LAWS. EACH AGENDA ITEM IS EXAMINED FOR POTENTIAL CONFLICT BY ANY BOARD MEMBER. IF CONFLICT IS RECOGNIZED THE BOARD MEMBER WILL RECUSE HIMSELF FROM THE VOTE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE HEAD OF SCHOOL RECEIVES ANNUAL REVIEW AND APPROVAL BY THE BOARD CHAIR TO DETERMINE HIS CONTRACT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
